class thx.macro.MacroFields

Available on neko

Extension methods to work with class fields at macro time.

Class Fields

static function isMethod(field:Field):Bool

Returns true if the field is a method.

static function isPublic(field:Field):Bool

Returns true if the field has the public qualifier.

static function isStatic(field:Field):Bool

Returns true if the field has the static qualifier.

Toggle inherited fields
